summary.title: Kristian Kålund's Notes for His Articles in Bricka's 'Dansk Biografisk Lexikon'

supportDesc.extent: 647 foliated leaves in various sizes, approx. 51-227 58-286 .
supportDesc.foliation: Foliated in pencil. Only written leaves are foliated.

history.origin: The materials were gradually collected in years 1886-1904, when Kålund worked in Copenhagen.

source.p: This shelfmark is registered in the handwritten catalogue of the Accessoria collection (AM 478 fol. (fol. 57r)).
Catalogued 21 February 2019 by Katarzyna Anna Kapitan.
